pytraj.externals.gdt package¶

Submodules¶

pytraj.externals.gdt.calc_score module¶

pytraj.externals.gdt.calc_score.calc_score(traj, top=None, ref=None, mask='*', dtype='pyarray', score='gdtscore', *args, **kwd)¶

return gdtscore or tmscore or maxsub

traj : Trajectory-like | list-like | Frame-like ref : Frame, reference, default=None (use first frame)

ref must have the same atom number as traj.top (or top)

top : Topology object mask : str, atom mask score : str

gdtscore or tmscore or maxsub
>>> from pytraj.common_actions import calc_protein_score
>>> calc_protein_score(traj, ref=traj[0])
